channel.title: vmware on devopstales

item.title: veeam backup: I can't create a backup job to my AWS S3 repository
item.description: In this pos I will show you how you can backup to AWS S3 with Veeam Backup.

item.title: veeam backup: Cant Add Repository to a Scale Out Backup Repository?
item.description: When adding repositories to a Veeam Scale Out Backup Repository you may see this error: Cant Add Repository to a Scale Out Backup Repository? In this Pos I will show you how you can fix is issue.

item.title: How to install ESXi nested inside ProxMox VE
item.description: Int his post I will show you how you can install an vmware ESX host in Proxmox VE.

item.title: Configure Kubernetes In-Tree vSphere Cloud Provider
item.description: In this post I will show you how can you use vmware for persistent storagi on K8S.

item.title: PhotonOS Basics
item.description: Project Photon OS is an open source, minimal Linux container host that is optimized for cloud-native applications, cloud platforms, and VMware infrastructure.

item.title: How to create Vagrant box?
item.description: In this post I will show you how to create a vagrant box from pothonos ISO.

item.title: Openshift: External registry
item.description: I this post I will demonstrate howyou can use an external registry in Openshift.

item.title: Install vMWare Harbor
item.description: Vmware harbor ia an open source trusted cloud native registry project that stores, signs, and scans content.

item.title: Configure Openshift In-Tree vSphere Cloud Provider
